Related Character(s): 昊
Связанный символ (и): 昊

昦字的基本解释

昦
hào
古同“昊”。

昦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hào］
［《廣韻》胡老切，上晧，匣。］
亦作“昦1”。
(1)指广漠的天宇。
(2)通“晧”。光明。
(3)通“皞”。古帝伏羲太皞氏，《汉书·古今人表》作太昊氏。参见“太皥”。
(4)姓。相传为昊英氏之后。一说为少昊之后。见汉应劭《风俗通·姓氏下》。明有昊十九。

昦字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　昦； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页493第11
【廣韻】胡老切【集韻】下老切，?音皓。同昊。詳昊字註。

昦字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
昦字的起名意思

古同“昊”。

Ju
Basic explanation of words
Ju
hào
Gu Tong "Hao".
Ju
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hào］
["Guangyun" Hu Laoqie, Shang Hao, Xia. ]
Also known as "昦1".
(1) Refers to the vast Tianyu.
(2) Through "Hao". bright.
(3) Through "皞". The ancient emperor Fuxi Taihao's family, "Han Shu · Ancient and Modern People's Table" was made Taihao's family. See "Taizuo".
(4) Last name. According to legend, it was after the Hao Ying clan. After talking about Shaohao. See Han Yingshao's "Fun Sutong · Under the Surname". Ming You Hao Nineteen.
Ju

[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Department] 　昦; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 493-11
[Guang Yun] Hu Laoqie [Ji Yun] Laoqie,? Yin Hao. Tong Hao. Detailed note of Hao words.
